events.desc: Sevilla have won just two of their last six LaLiga home games against Celta de Vigo, after winning seven of their previous nine top-flight home encounters against them. Monaco have scored in 14 of their 15 home Ligue 1 games against Lorient, with the only exception being a 0-0 draw in February 2022.
